info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 6:31PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Lake and southeastern Sanders Counties through 700 PM MDT... At 629 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Old Agency, or 24 miles south of Polson, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 45 mph, half-inch size hail, and heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ravalli, St. Ignatius, Old Agency, Dixon, Moiese and Charlo. This includes the following highways... Highway 93 N between mile markers 26 and 35. Highway 200 W between mile markers 104 and 115. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
